data.title: Charlotte Savoy – KW MAPS Coaching

data.text:
Charlotte Savoy is a native of Maryland, where she lives with her husband, Ike, and their three sons, Josh, Jalen, and Braeden, along with their mini bernedoodles, Beaux and Izzy.

She began her real estate career in 1999 as a buyer’s agent on a team and proud to have established herself as a respected leader & innovator in the industry.

Three times in her career she’s been a partner in the #1 Real Estate team in the world, and in 2016, she launched a small & mighty local Real Estate team, The Savoy Team of Keller Williams Integrity, where they’ve maintained a spot in the Top 10 Teams at all Brokerages in Maryland and have helped more than 5000 people buy and sell homes. In 2016, she launched a charity called “Just ONE Kid,” where they feed more than 225 kids weekly in their community with the profits they make in our Real Estate Sales business. She is also an investor partner in Keller Williams Integrity, and co-own a home renovation and property investment company with her husband.

She has been a Business and Leadership Coach since 2012 and coached some pretty big businesses and helped them increase their productivity, profitability, growth, life balance, and intentionality in giving back, and loved every minute of it! In 2018 she joined MAPS Business Coaching, where she served as the President alongside her partners Abe Shreve and Gary Keller. They’ve currently growing a massive coaching and training company and currently coach business owners and leaders producing over $3.4 Billion in annual revenue and then in 2022, they launched the Millionaire Business Network where they are changing the lives of business owners all over the country.
